summary: Should work with any body mods... or even the vanilla body.
descriptionHtml:
[color=gray] This is for both male and female characters regardless of the body mod(s) you use. Should work for Vanilla or SFW undies versions too.

So after fifty attempts to make a working dry skin specular without artifacts, I found making it all one nearly black color is the only guaranteed way to achieve that. 
___________ _____ _____ ___ ___ __ _


[size=5]Ever look down at your arm or at your face and see how... [i]not oily[/i] it is? Me too. 

Here's a fix.[/size]

____________ ____ ____ ___ ____ __ _ 

Make sure to back up any specular maps you have, because this mod will overwrite them. Specular maps have a _s at the end of the filename (i.e. femalehead_s.dds). This[/color][color=white] overwrites both male and female character specular maps.[/color]
author: Wyn Xombii
